page.title: 05Village Life and Events.
page.content:
'Last Saturday ( May 14 ) it was village day... at the Village Hall. I went in fancy dress. I dressed up as Barbara Woodhouse.My sister was in the maypole dancing. The P.T.A. were in charge of the school sweet stall-it was yellow with a big blue umbrella over it. The majorettes came in a coach. They had two dogs which sat and watched...There was also a fire engine which you could go on and the fireman kept putting on the radio.'
'Most years we have a talent contest in the Village Hall. The children sing and dance or do other things to see who is the best. I won a pound for singing 'Doh a Deer' our school sang and won a prize. I was also in 'The Snow Queen' I was an Elf and a snowflake'
